Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters

Class GenericModifierCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.GenericModifierCard
public class GenericModifierCard extends CharacterCard
This Class represent the GenericModifierCard, a card which returns and/or memorizes a generic integer modifier

      Description copied from class: CharacterCard
      Uses a Character Card effect
      Specified by:
      useCard in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      t - The Table Manager object which might be used to get data (such as Students)
      players - The List of Players in the match
      currentPlayer - The current Player who used the card
      userInfo - Additional card parameters for the action
      Returns:
      an integer holding the numeric result of the effect
      Throws:
      CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException - If the parameters are incorrect
      CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException - If the card cannot be used anymore in the same turn

    • getModifier

      private int getModifier(TableManager tableManager, Player player, int targetIslandIndex, boolean increasesProfControl, boolean readsTargetIslandInfluence, boolean ignoresSavedStudents, boolean ignoresTowers, boolean isConstant, boolean readsModifiedMotherNatureSteps) throws CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException
      Computes the correct modifier that needs to be returned by the card
      Parameters:
      tableManager - The Tbale manager object used to get the Table data
      player - The current Player
      targetIslandIndex - The target island index
      increasesProfControl - Whether it increases the control of Professors
      readsTargetIslandInfluence - Whether the effect consists in reading the target island influence
      readsModifiedMotherNatureSteps - Whether the effect reads the memorized Mother Nature steps
      ignoresSavedStudents - Whether it should ignore the saved Students
      ignoresTowers - Whether it should ignore Towers
      Throws:
      CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException - if the parameter of the effect of card are incorrect
